import React from 'react'; import "./table.css"; import axios from 'axios'; function AllNewVolTable({ newVolData }) { function handleClickApprove(user_id) { alert(user_id); // event.preventDefault(); axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/approvedVolunter/${user_id}`) .then(response => { if (response.status === 200) { alert("אושר בהצלחה!"); } }) .catch(err => console.warn(err)); }; return ( {newVolData.map((item) => ( ))}
